trans-unit.source: Stores linked resources to be sent as part of an email message.
trans-unit.target: 이메일 메시지의 일부로 보낼 연결된 리소스를 저장합니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> class is returned by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection" />.
Call <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.
The <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A> 메서드를 사용하면 <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>를 사용할 수 없게 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> occupied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A>를 호출한 후에는 가비지 수집기가 <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>에서 사용하던 메모리를 회수할 수 있도록 <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>에 대한 모든 참조를 해제해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [관리 되지 않는 리소스 정리](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 및 [Dispose 메서드를 구현](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A> on all views in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 호출 <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.Dispose%2A> 이 컬렉션의 모든 뷰에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Dispose%2A> method.
You do not need to call it in your application.
Always call <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection.Dispose%2A>에 대한 마지막 참조를 해제하기 전에 반드시 <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection>를 호출하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 이렇게 하지 않으면 가비지 수집기가 <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection> 개체의 `Finalize` 메서드를 호출할 때까지 사용 중인 리소스가 해제되지 않습니다.
